mapper.select: SELECT A.REAL_PRJT_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.SCH_ENT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS SCH_ENT_DT , A.SKILL_GRD , A.MAIN_SKILL , A.DUTY_TXT , A.OTH_CNT , A.NMBR_RCRT , B.EMPNM AS OPR_NM , A.APLC_DTLS , A.BKUP_ID , A.PRJT_ID , A.SQNO , A.REQPE_NO AS OPR_NO FROM pms_prj_prs_rqs A LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info B ON B.EMPNO = A.REQPE_NO AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID WHERE A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.SCH_ENT_DT

SELECT CONCAT(B.EMPNM,'[',B.RANK_NM,']') AS EMPNM ,C.MAIN_SKILL ,C.DUTY_TXT ,D.DTLS_TYNM AS SKILL_GRD_NM ,A.INP_PRJ_NM ,C.NXT_PRJ_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.WTH_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS WTH_DT ,A.INP_CLS_CD FROM pms_inp_mnp_stt A LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info B ON B.BZCD NOT IN ('400','500') AND B.EMPNO = A.EMPNO AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_man_pfle_info C ON C.MAN_NO = A.EMPNO AND C.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND C.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_cd_del_mng D ON D.DTLS_TYCD = C.SKILL_GRD AND D.GRP_TYCD = '1000000042' AND D.PRJT_ID = C.PRJT_ID AND D.BKUP_ID = C.BKUP_ID WHERE A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND (A.INP_CLS_CD = '대기' OR A.WTH_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 3 MONTH),'%Y%m%d')) ORDER BY A.WTH_DT, B.EMPNM
